mapper.select: /* User.xml -> selectMemberUserInfo */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY HAN_NAME asc) ROWNUM ,MEMBER_ID ,HAN_NAME ,ENG_NAME ,TEL_NO ,EMAIL ,PARTNER_HAN_NAME ,PARTNER_ENG_NAME ,PARTNER_GENDER ,PARTNER_TEL_NO ,RET_YN ,REG_DTM ,UPD_DTM FROM tb_admin_reg_member

SELECT MEMBER_ID , HAN_NAME , ENG_NAME , TEL_NO , EMAIL , REG_ID , REG_DTM , UPD_ID , UPD_DTM FROM tb_admin_reg_member WHERE 1=1
AND HAN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{MEMBER_SEARCH_TEXT},'%')
AND TEL_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{MEMBER_SEARCH_TEXT},'%')
AND MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}
